parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default: `20`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination. Default: `0`.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter results by version name. Returns versions containing the search term.

parameters.name: isPublished
parameters.description: Filter by publication status. Set to `true` to retrieve published versions, `false` for draft versions.
